review: First impression: The packaging was neat and not messy. The chrome came with easy instructions with all the required items to power the dongle. Very easy to set up using any web browser. Fortunately for me I've done my research and came across neat "tricks" for this device.....(Just google Chromecast tricks).Friends' impression: Very awesome to have the "que" technology. This way everyone can enjoy their vids in order using each individual's phone/tablet.Cons: Has some stability issues when streaming an entire tab on google chrome, the video does not flow very well since it is streaming an entire tab.- Took a while to get used to because it has 2 abilities of casting the actual video and casting a web browser's tab.- No security or matching device option to play on the Chromecast. What I meant is that anyone can play on the Chromecast without restrictions except for being in the same network. Hence, if you have more than 1 Chromecast in the house, you can prank and play random videos on the other Chromecast.
